Name: Do you want to get notified of opportunities to earn?
Yes, show me developer roles!
Text: You'll get notified of openings for "Builders", and technical roles in other working groups.

Name: Yes, but only in content distribution.
Text: You'll get notified of opportunities as a Storage Provider, Distributor and App owner.

Name: Yes, I want to work with/for the community.
Text: You'll be notified of openings in the HR, Marketing, Moderator and Membership working groups.
Channels: content-curator, human-resources, marketing, membership, opportunities and openings

Name: Yes, I want to work with curating content or apps
Text: You'll be notified of openings as a Curator and App Operator.
Channels: NFTs, apps, content-curator, creator-tokens, creators, opportunities and openings

Name: Yes, I want it all!
Text: You'll get a notification for every new opening.
Roles: aspiring community worker, aspiring creator, aspiring developer, aspiring earner, aspiring server engineer

Name: Yes, I already have a Joystream Channel
Yes, an established one.
Text: But haven't signed up for Joystream yet
